title: Quarkus Newsletter #24 - September
content: Time for the September Newsletter. Learn how to manage the same data in different forms to avoid dual writes and data loss with "Debezium and Quarkus: Change Data Capture Patterns to Avoid Dual-Writes Problems" by Alex Soto and Michael Redlich. Check out part 3 of Heiko Ruppâ€™s series on how...
